main event: An observer sighted a white flashing light in Hunter, New York on April 7, 1952 for 12 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as not being a bona fide satellite despite the flashing light., The flashing light had a period of approximately 2-3 seconds., The observer noted that the object was traveling in a level course at an undetermined altitude., The reported sighting occurred in an area with SAGE stations that also reported UFOs., The observer was advised to contact the Air Force for future sightings.
witness description: The observer provided a detailed description of the sighting.
